page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: RECREATION IN STAUNTON ON WYE Staunton village hall is run by a Hall Committee and in frequent use for local activities. Regular meetings are Rifle Club(Mon.) Over Sixties(Tues.) Wives Group(Wed.) and Bingo Night (Thurs.). Parish Council meetings are held there and fund raising events like dances and jumble sales. There is a football club, playing in the local league. Several boys go motor-cycle scrambling regularly with help from 2 adults who organise the trips. Another villager hopes to start a deep-sea fishing club. There are 3 local pubs, The Portway, The Swan and New Inn, where the usual pub games of darts, pool and skittles are played.
